summary: Mr. Siika Ravens and Vultures - a Beyond Skyrim resource converted for Skyrim from the Oblivion resource by Mr Siika
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-g4MUjm_1RAU/U1u0h-aZoPI/AAAAAAAAF9o/seYIy8x73xs/s128/BS%20-%20Resources.png[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

=========================
Mr. Siika Ravens and Vultures

Modder's Resource
=========================

By mr_siika

Converted by Tamira

=========================

This is a Beyond Skyrim resource converted for Skyrim from the Oblivion resource by Mr Siika.


You can find the original file here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/23523/?

=========================

There are three ravens and three vultures, all animated. You can add them as statics or as activators to the game.
No sounds included but of course you can add your own sounds.

=========================

Visit the Beyond Skyrim forums:
http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/
http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/626-beyond-skyrim-projects/
They still look for talented modders who want to help with their projects

=========================
Tools Used:
=========================

Nifskope
NifUtils by Skyfox

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modders resource.You may use the files for your own mods as long as you give credit and you do not charge money for it.
Please link back to this resource when you use it in your mod.

Do not upload to other sites.

mr_siika has been away from modding for quite some time, and will likely not return to the forums.
Deeza from the Beyond Skyrim team was originally granted permission to port the assets featured in this resource, he can prove the permission, which I have seen too.

=================
Credits:
=================

mr_siika for his resources and for everything he has given to the TES community
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope.
Skyfox from the Niftools team for his great tool NifUtils
The Beyond Skyrim Team
author: mr_siika and Tamira
